4314060.name: PuzzMao〜Puzzle and Magical Overlord〜
4314060.description:
The strongest puzzle player can become the Demon Lord!?

Defeat advancing enemies with puzzles! A heartwarming fantasy × falling-block puzzle game

“PuzzMao～Puzzle and Magical Overlord～” is a falling-block puzzle game set in a fantasy world where players battle for the Demon Lord's throne!

Use simple rules and exhilarating puzzles to crush advancing enemies!

Intercept monsters descending from above with puzzles!

Match same-colored Mana Blocks and Staff Blocks to clear them and unleash magic!

You can send Monster Blocks to the top of your opponent's field.

Chain combos to send massive waves of monsters, crushing your opponent in one fell swoop...!

Send as many Monster Blocks as possible to your opponent's field!

Skill activation for a sudden reversal!

Use each character's unique skills for a game-changing reversal!?

From simple skills that clear stacked monster blocks to gamble skills that wreak havoc on both your and your opponent's fields.

Even when monster blocks pile up, you can't let your guard down!

Story

Many years have passed since the Great Demon War between humanity and the demon race.

Foolish humanity had destroyed itself through ugly infighting.

The surviving demons, determined not to repeat the same mistake, avoided conflict and decided to determine their ruler through a game simulating battle: the Demon King Decisive Battle...

In a corner of this world, living in the frontier, was Fal, a boy from an ultra-minor, weak demon clan. He was honest, energetic, and loved puzzles.

His sister, Yule, was a useless demon who thought, ‘I wish my little brother would support me for life~’.

One day, upon hearing the proclamation for the Demon King Selection Tournament , Yule sensed the scent of a chance for lifelong security. She tricked... persuaded her honest, gullible younger brother, and successfully secured his entry into the tournament.

Faru felt slightly tricked, but ended up aiming to become Demon King himself—while being tossed around by the other Demon King candidates, who were even more eccentric than Yule.
